amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds in contravention of "Buy American Preferences".

action.text: Mr. Latham raised a point of order against the Garamendi amendment (A048). Mr. Latham stated that the Garamendi amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
